CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, January 10, 1938, p. 4, reads: "Out Pittsburgh way, 'Jap' Harris [Washington], former first-base star on the celebrated Homestead Grays, is now the genial bartender at the C. and G. Cabaret. He now lets the crowds catch the highballs. (Photo by Charles Harris, Pittsburgh, Pa.)"
TitMainTitle: Man wearing dark vest, and Jasper "Jap" Washington wearing apron, posed behind bar in C. and G. Cabaret
